name: Alexa Traffic Widget
author: Amir Heydari

sections.description: Alexa is the leading provider of free, global web metrics. Search Alexa to discover the most successful sites on the web by keyword, category, or country. Use our analytics for competitive analysis, benchmarking, market research, or business development.
sections.installation:
1. Upload alexa-traffic-widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Appearance > Widgets in WordPress
  4. Select the section where you want the widget to appear and click Show
  5. Click save changes
sections.faq:
Does this work?

Yes.

What if I have more questions?

Please visit my website

short_description: Shows your site Alexa rank instantly in the widget area without editing code.
description: Alexa is the leading provider of free, global web metrics. Search Alexa to discover the most successful sites on the web by keyword, category, or country. Use our analytics for competitive analysis, benchmarking, market research, or business development.
